thread.title: Decline of Windies cricket reduces Sir Garry Sobers to tears in Lanka
thread.title_full: Decline of Windies cricket reduces Sir Garry Sobers to tears in Lanka - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Decline of Windies cricket reduces Sir Garry Sobers to tears in Lanka
text:
*Colombo:* Former West Indies captain Sir Garfield Sobers was moved to tears by the current plight of the islanders' standing in international cricket.
*Garfield Sobers*
Sobers, regarded as one of the greatest all-rounders of all time, cannot see any parallel between the current Windies team and the one he played in, or with ... Â»
